disp-quote.p: “ When I heard about PrEP, I came running because the nature of my job. […] I can meet an individual who is HIV-positive in my job. God blessed me so far that I am HIV-negative but I knew I was not going to continue to be skillful, so I decided to [take PrEP] and protect myself. ”–Female, 31, CSW (RUR04) (AAM)
